# Visual Studio Code
 
Workspace Commands       | 
-------------------------|-----
**Command Palette**      | ctrl shift p
**Search & open file**   | ctrl p

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}

Edit code                | 
-------------------------|-----
**Outdent line**         | ctrl '
**Toggle comment line**  | ctrl §
**Move line up or down** | alt &uarr; / alt &darr;
**Copy line up or down** | alt shift &uarr; / alt shift &darr;

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}

Code Navigation          | 
-------------------------|-----
**Go to line**           | {{< kbd Ctrl-G >}} / {{< kbd Ctrl-P :>}}

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}

Code selection           | 
-------------------------|-----
**Select line**          | {{< kbd Ctrl-L >}}
**Expand selection**     | {{< shift-alt-&rarr; >}}

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}
